ShadowSiren:TestCard.NAME: Test Card
ShadowSiren:TestCard.DESCRIPTION: Remove Weak, Frail, and Vulnerable. NL If negative, remove Strength, Dexterity, and Focus. NL Gain 1 Artifact. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] .
